title: Ticket #7217: Singularity jobs need to detect singularity errors
description: When HTCondor is configured for the starter to run a job under singularity, it just returns the error code of the singularity exec as the job exit code. If there is a singularity error, this is returned as a job exit code, so a configuration or system error causes the job to leave the queue. Just like we do with java universe, we need to differentiate a system or environment error from a job error.
